title: The end of the rip-off economy
description: From finance and medicine to used cars, artificial intelligence is radically improving market efficiency
content: These examples add up to something bigger. As AI goes mainstream, it will remove one of the most enduring distortions in modern capitalism: the information advantages that sellers, service providers and intermediaries enjoy over consumers. When every... [6971 chars]

title: Tech giants hold their copyright line after government rebuke
description: The industry will seek to convince Canberra that its plans to make artificial intelligence makers pay for the content they use is globally uncompetitive.
content:
Technology companies will seek to convince the government that its planned reforms to make them pay for the content they train artificial intelligence systems on will put Australia out of step with other comparable countries.

title: Elon Musk launches Grokipedia as an alternative to 'woke' Wikipedia
description: Tech billionaire Elon Musk on Monday launched an online encyclopedia, named Grokipedia, that he said was fueled by artificial intelligence and designed to be closer to his conservative political views than the leading alternative, Wikipedia
content:

title: Google unveils plan to restart US nuclear plant to power AI infrastructure
description: New York, United States—Google unveiled a plan Monday to restart a nuclear facility in Iowa to power the company's artificial intelligence
content:

title: Chegg slashes 45% of workforce, blames 'new realities of AI'
description: The online education company said the combination of artificial intelligence and diminished traffic from search engines like Google has hurt the business.
content:
Chegg said on Monday it would lay off about 45% of its workforce, or 388 employees, as the "new realities" of artificial intelligence and diminished traffic from internet search have led to plummeting revenue.

title: Gen Z Faces Toughest Job Market as Entry
